summary: This document is a financial statement for the account of Disco Scientia Corporation at Fifth Third Bank for the period of February 1, 2018, to February 28, 2018. It details the account's beginning and ending balances, service charges, and criteria for waiving those charges.

persons.name: Cesar Taverns
persons.context: Cesar Taverns is identified as the Relationship Manager for the business banking account of Disco Scientia Corporation.

keyFacts: The account belongs to Disco Scientia Corporation.
The beginning balance for the account on February 1, 2018, was $236.26.
The ending balance for the account on February 28, 2018, was also $236.26.
A standard monthly service charge of $11.00 was withdrawn on February 12, 2018.
The account did not meet the criteria for waiving the service charge.
